artist: artist: Silvia Furmanovich; artist: after Wari artist
description: wood marquetry rectangular box with rounded corners; hinged lid; polished semicircle knob; intricate geometric design based on a Huari/Wari textile in the Mia collection; wood inlay varies in shades of black, browns, reds, blond; veneers are native Brazilian woods; knob is a semicircle of red marbeled stone or resin; four felt feet adhered to bottom; interior lined with light gray velvet; dark gray velvet drawstring storage bag with artist's name and logo printed in gold letters
signed: embossed into velvet inside lid: SILVIA FERMANOVICH
title: Wooden marquetry box
